title: When patch 6.22 will be release i can't wait!
body: WHEN PATCH 6.22 WILL BE RELEASE PLEASE REPLY ME WITH TRUE ANSWERS!!!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I don't have any details on unreleased content to offer.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay updated on anything coming up.  Get hyped!
